text:
vyati#ShajyantE praqjayA# paqSuBiqrya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa# EqtA AsaqtE &klRu#ptAq vA EqtE su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ~Mya#ntyuccAvaqcAn hi stOmA#nupaqyantiq yadEqta Uqd^^rdhvAH klRuqptAH stOmAq Bava#nti klRuqptA Eqva su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ~Mya#ntyuqBayO#rEqByO lOqkayO$H kalpatE triq(gm)qSadEqtAstriq(gm)qSada#kSharA viqrADanna#M viqrAD viqrAjaiqvAnnAdyaqmava# rundhatE &tirAqtrAvaqBitO# BavatOq &nnAdya#syaq pari#gRuhItyai || 14 
(OSha#dhIH - saM~Mvathsaqra EqvA - &va# - pratiqShThAyaq - vyati#Shaqktyai - kAqnnapa#~jcAqSacca#) (A3)
